comment: I wouldnt take him. He does easy problems in class and he will tell you the test comes from the hw. NOT TRUE AT ALL! when you get the test, the questions are hard. I have not passed a test yet and we are 4 tests in. He seems not to care and he will tell you to go to math lab and SI which are useless. Avoid him.

Dr. Evans explains the material well and gives extra credit chances. His tests will not be like what you do in the homework or what is done in class. They will be really hard, so you better find extra practice other than what is given. I do not recommend taking him unless your really good at math.

I'm not sure what class these others are taking, but I would not advise taking him. I'm a non traditional math major so I'm serious about school. Never miss a class, do all homework and study a ton extra. I have gotten 50s on 2 of 4 tests. EXTREMELY difficult. Class spent working on easy examples but the test problems are over the top. Deflating!

He is a very helpful teacher. Does a lot of example problems to make it clear. The tests are easy if you do the homework and practice. Extra credit quizzes are helpful too. I would recommend taking him.

Prof. Evans is a pretty cool guy. I mean, the class is rather dry, but he helps you through it, makes the information very basic and clear, and tells you exactly what he expects from you. I had him for a Friday 9:30am Trig class, so it had potential to suck, but Evans is a good teacher so it wasn't too bad. I definitely recommend him.

I had him for the summer course, class was difficult but the professor was very clear in his expectations. A good grade can be achieved with good attendance, and doing the homework and asking questions in class. I would certainly take this professor again for another course.

He will understand if you have a problem and will let you make up quizzes and tests. 7 quizzes 3 test,3 extra credit quizzes that are worth 3 pts of ur grade and a accumulative final (very hard final). AN A is possible but alot of studying on your own is required. Lots of ppl were very happy in my class with a B. Recommend him
He was a really good teacher. Very straightforward teaching method, with a lot of repetition and examples. Fair grading, really nice guy. I would recommend him to everyone.

Took awhile to get used to his teaching but overall i recommend him. He is extremely nice and will answer any questions you have. HE is specific about what is going to be on exam and grades extremely fairly. Gives you partial points just for trying! however, if you do not have a simple understanding of math i do not recommend.
Dr. Evans is a very good professor. He is very clear in his lesson and is himself very knowledgeable. I recommend taking him, especially if you have never had Calc before

He was a great Professor. Very clear and detailed in notes. He does not use math lab or math excell so you save money at textbook time. A great teacher and made calculus understandable. Plus there are 3 easy extra credit quizes. Higly recomend taking him.

Nice forward teacher, I'm currently in Calculus 1 and it seems very easy. Dr. Evans is very helpful and very willing to spend extra time on a topic you are having difficulty with. I would strongly recommend him.
He's so nice, but his calc class is so extremely hard!! Gosh this class messed my GPA

He's very helpful! He teaches you everything you need to know for the tests. Do the hw from the book and you will do fine on the exams. Tests can be somewhat difficult sometimes though. He's very nice. Love Dr. Evans! Take him if you can.
